name: Jigsaw Tetris
description:
Test your patience and OCD with this game of Tetris where you clear lines with puzzle looking pieces. The lack of grid lines will increase the chance of you dropping blocks at the wrong spot as you lose your sanity to the looping lofi tetris music hehe... 

controls: left, right, down arrows to move, up arrow to rotate.

BGM: 8bit lofi Tetris Theme by Ángela Pérez Pérez
